author: David Taroyan
comment: This is a great watch face...  Would like to see some more customization options like different colors,  taking off the weather indicator and I would really like to be able to remove the circle outline.
title: Love it!

author: SLaGG3R
comment: Can't seem to find any sort of options to use Fahrenheit for weather . in fact there is zero options . would like to see an ability to add watch battery % to this .  other then that very different and unique take . not sure the effect it will have on my moto 360s battery life yet but we will see. If I can get a reply to this comment or my email I'll add the 5th star asap

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Hi Jacob,
Really appreciate for rating us :) .The new version just updated yesterday. Please download and enjoy it !  Regard to battery %. We would try our best to add this function into next version.
Wanna more news about Magic team? Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface

title: Looks great

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Hi Soctt, Really thank you for rating us. :) Wanna have more Magic faces ? Feel free to check out the below link. Some of them are free right now! https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6392193583717246493&hl=zh-CN Follow us on twitter, you could find more interesting things about Magic team there :) https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
